name: Streadata.io API Gallery - CRON
description: This is a repository of cron APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: EasyCron
apis.description: EasyCron provides the most stable Cron Job Services. Here you can schedule cron jobs with execution logs, Email notifications, run time predictions and a bunch of other featuers!
